title: Otherside
lyrics:
on the other side
I was born in somewhere beautiful
a little bit more
a little bit more

where's the other side?

I was lost in way to be beautiful

a little bit more

a little bit more



why do we all pretend to be in the action?

maybe you are happy to be in the nation



on the other side

there's a somthing changing you and me

on the other side

there's a place where you will rock your body



into someone never need to run

into someone never fall alone

but you don't know where you are



1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 days

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 Who Who

takes me away?

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 days

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 Who Who

takes me away from here?



you don't have the time

and you don't know where to find your mind

a little bit more

a little bit more

why do we all pretend to be in the action?



1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 days

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 Who Who

takes me away?

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 days

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 Who Who

takes me away from here?
